data.title: Beyond Good & Evil 20th Anniversary Edition Launching Next Week
data.meta_description: Ubisoft has announced that Beyond Good & Evil 20th Anniversary Edition will be released on June 25, 2024.
data.text:
Ubisoft has announced that Beyond Good & Evil 20th Anniversary Edition will be released for PlayStation 4, PlayStation 5, Xbox One, Xbox Series X|S, Nintendo Switch, and PC via the Ubisoft Store, Epic Games Store and Steam on June 25, 2024.

Limited Run Games will host a physical and collector’s edition, with pre-orders opening on July 12, 2024.

This release will feature 4K resolution and 60 FPS with improved graphics, controls, and a reorchestrated soundtrack. Other new features include an autosave feature and cross-saving. Veteran fans can also anticipate a new speedrun mode, cutscene skipping, full controller and keyboard and mouse support, 20+ new achievements, and the anniversary gallery, which houses details surrounding the game’s development.

Beyond Good & Evil follows reporter Jade as she investigates the DomZ alien attack in the world of Hillys. Allies like her adoptive uncle Pey’j and Double H support her in accomplishing this objective. Alongside learning more about her past, Jade will combat various creatures, solve puzzles, play minigames, and take photos with her camera on hand.

There will also be an exclusive new mission revealing a narrative link to Beyond Good & Evil 2.
